findings.title: Use safeTransfer consistently instead of transfer
The setToken should limit 0 address to add
findings.description: The _setToken_ function does not limit whether to add address(0) as a token address. If address(0) is added successfully, the code for transferring token in _crossChain_ will be invalid.

findings.title: [HIESWAP-3] Should check that the lengths of the incoming arrays are the same
findings.description: Both functions in _setTokens_ and _multiOut_ accept multiple array parameters. If the length of one array is inconsistent with other arrays, the execution will fail.

findings.title: The transferOwner lacks check for 0 address
findings.description: If newOwner is address(0), it is equivalent to giving up ownership, and all functions that require administrator operations will not be executed.
